description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 79196/APP/2024/3028, dated 19/02/2025 Construction of a part single-storey, part two storey rear extension, alterations to first floor - to amend the description of development to the 'erection of a single storey rear extension' with subsequent amendments to the approved plans listed under Condition 2 of the permission.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers A02a and A03.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 1 (2012) and Part 2 (2020), and the London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than condition 2, which is superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: ref. 79196/APP/2024/3028, dated 19/02/2025  must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
